METROPOLITAN AREA POPULATION1950 1990 2015 2035 City <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="12.8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>12.8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> million <math alttext="16.1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>16.1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> million <math alttext="18.6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>18.6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> million <math alttext="20.8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>20.8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> million City <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="2.3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> million <math alttext="14.8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>14.8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> million <math alttext="20.9" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>20.9</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> million <math alttext="24.5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>24.5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> million 
Which of the following explains the pattern of growth in City <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> relative to City <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: City <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> is located in a less developed country and has high rates of rural-to-urban migration, whereas City <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> is located in a more developed country and has low rates of rural-to-urban migration.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data to draw conclusions.
